name: The Blind Knight
description:
A Puzzle Adventure game made in 3 Hours for Trijam #59.

Use the arrow keys to move and SPACE to toggle your hearing.

You play as the blind knight, who has lost his eyes after being thrown into a monster infested dungeon. After many months of surviving off of scraps you finally gain the ability to navigate using echolocation. But this dungeon has a twist to it. if you can't hear something, it doesn't exist! Use this to your advantage by turning on and off your echolocation ability by covering and uncovering your ears and get through the dungeon all the way to the exit.

All assets and code were created during the 3 hour time limit.
